title: Cigna Autism Coverage
shortDescription: Comprehensive health insurance offering autism services including ABA therapy, evaluations, and behavioral health support in Florida.
description: Cigna Healthcare provides health insurance coverage throughout Florida with comprehensive autism spectrum disorder benefits. Their plans include coverage for Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) therapy, developmental evaluations, speech and occupational therapy, and mental health services. Cigna emphasizes care coordination and offers dedicated case management for members with autism to help navigate available services and providers.
howItWorks: Confirm autism coverage in your specific Cigna plan
Obtain autism diagnosis from qualified medical professional
Your provider submits prior authorization request for therapies
Use in-network providers to maximize benefits
Cigna may assign case manager for complex care coordination

typicalCosts.monthly_premium: Varies by plan type ($180-$1,400+/month for family coverage)

commonQuestions.question: Does Cigna cover ABA therapy in Florida?
commonQuestions.answer: Yes, Cigna plans sold in Florida must cover ABA therapy for children under 18 with annual coverage of at least $36,000 per Florida insurance law.

commonQuestions.question: How long does prior authorization take with Cigna?
commonQuestions.answer: Standard requests typically take 3-7 business days. Urgent requests may be expedited. Your provider will receive notification once approved.

commonQuestions.question: Can I choose any ABA provider?
commonQuestions.answer: You will get the best coverage using in-network providers. Check Cigna's provider directory or ask your ABA clinic if they are in-network.

commonQuestions.question: What if therapy visits are denied by Cigna?
commonQuestions.answer: You can appeal the decision. Contact Cigna member services and work with your provider to submit documentation of medical necessity.
